呿字的基本解释

呿
qū
（口）张开：“公孙龙口呿而不合。”
卧息。

呿字的汉语字典释义

[①]［qù］
［《廣韻》丘倨切，去御，溪。］
［《廣韻》丘伽切，平戈，溪。］
［《廣韻》去劫切，入業，溪。］
(1)张口貌。
(2)梵字音译。参见“呿陀”。
(3)见“呿嗟”。
(4)叹词。

呿字的康熙字典解释

【丑集上】【口字部】　呿； 康熙笔画：8； 页码：页184第02
【廣韻】丘伽切【集韻】去伽切，?音佉。【玉篇】張口貌。【集韻】啓口謂之呿。【莊子·秋水篇】公孫龍口呿而不合。【呂氏春秋】君呿而不?。　又【玉篇】丘居切【集韻】丘於切，?音墟。又【集韻】丘據切，音去。本作㰦，義?同。　又【廣韻】去劫切【集韻】乞業切，?音怯。【廣韻】臥聲。【集韻】臥息也。　又【集韻】又業切，音裛。口開貌。

呿字的源字形

字形对比：

中国大陆宋体台湾细明体香港明体日本明朝体韩国明朝体旧字形
呿字的起名意思

暂无。

Basic explanation of words
Sigh
qū
(Mouth) opened: "Gongsunlong's mouth is suffocated."
Lie down.
Sigh
Chinese dictionary definition of words
[①]［qù］
["Guangyun" Qiu cut, go to Yu, Xi. ]
["Guang Yun" Qiu Jiaqie, Ping Ge, Xi. ]
["Guangyun" go to robbery and cut, enter the industry, stream. ]
(1) Open mouth appearance.
(2) Transliteration of Sanskrit characters. See "Xituo".
(3) See "呿嗟".
(4) Interjection.

Kangxi dictionary interpretation of words
[Chou Ji 1] [Words Department] 　呿; Kangxi strokes: 8; Page number: page 184 02
[Guangyun] Qiu Jiaqie 【Jiyun】Go to Jiaqie,? Yin Yu. 【Jade articles】Open your mouth and look. [Jiyun] Kaikou said that it is 呿. [Zhuangzi·Qiu Shui Chapter] Gongsun Long’s mouth was suffocated. [Lu Shi Chunqiu] You are not so happy.　[Jade articles] Qiu Juqie [Jiyun] Qiu Yuqie, the sound market. Also [Jiyun] Qiu cuts, and the sound goes. This is 㰦, righteous? The same.　[Guangyun] Go to Jieqie [Jiyun] Begging for business,? Sound timid. [Guang Yun] Lying sound. [Ji Yun] Lie down.　[Jiyun] Again, the karma is cut, the sound is stunned. Open mouth and appearance.
